mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, gmt_created, gmt_modified, is_deleted
mapper.select:
select
from account where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: update account set is_deleted = 1 where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into account
user_id,
user_name,
password,
gmt_created,
gmt_modified,
is_deleted,

mapper.update:
update account
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update account set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
